messages.title: We all face a choice about the future of our National Health Service.
messages.content: A better plan. A better future.
"Our NHS is too important to leave in the Tories' hands. We're backing Labour's plan to recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more doctors." - Bob & Margaret

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will guarantee cancer tests and results within one week, recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, and fund this through a mansion tax on properties worth over £2 million, clampdown on tax avoidance and a levy on tobacco firms.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Under the Tories there's a crisis in A&E, waiting lists are at their highest for six years and it's harder to see a GP.

issues.health: Labour will guarantee cancer tests and results within one week, recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, and fund this through a mansion tax on properties worth over £2 million, clampdown on tax avoidance and a levy on tobacco firms.

endorsements.endorsement: "Our NHS is too important to leave in the Tories' hands. We're backing Labour's plan to recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more doctors."

quotes.text: "Our NHS is too important to leave in the Tories' hands. We're backing Labour's plan to recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more doctors."

images.caption: Labour Party logo and election date.
